parties.raw_snippet:
between
Data Call Technologies, Inc.
600 Kenrick, Suite B-12
Houston, Texas 77060
hereinafter referred to as "Licensor"
and
PLAN_B MEDIA AG
Schaafenstr. 25
50676 Cologne
Germany
hereinafter referred to as "plan_b"
parties.reasoning: The header immediately following 'between' lists the two contracting entities with addresses and labels 'hereinafter referred to as ...'. These are the primary parties to the Agreement.

contract_type.reasoning: The agreement grants plan_b rights to produce, market and distribute Content owned or licensed by Licensor (see Sections 1.1, 2.3, 5.3). The primary economic substance is licensing content for commercial distribution, so this is a license agreement.

agreement_date.reasoning: In the signature block the dates shown next to PLAN_B's signatures are '03/24/06'. Licensor's signature block shows '3/23/06', but the contract contains PLAN_B's execution dated 03/24/06; the signature dates are the best evidence of when the parties executed the document.

effective_date.reasoning: Appendix 2 explicitly states the contract start date as 04-01-06, which is the date the contract takes effect/commences.

expiration_date.reasoning: Appendix 2 explicitly provides a contract end date of 04-01-08, which is the stated expiration date.

governing_law.raw_snippet: 10.1 This Agreement shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States of America. The courts of competent jurisdiction at New York City, New York, shall have the exclusive jurisdiction over any dispute arising out of or in connection with this Agreement.
governing_law.reasoning: The governing-law sentence expressly states the applicable law as 'the laws of the United States of America'. Although venue is specified as New York City, the clause explicitly names the governing law.

notice_period.raw_snippet: The Initial Term shall automatically be extended for an additional period of half a year unless either party provides the other party with written notification of termination of the letter Agreement at least 60 days prior to end of such period.
notice_period.reasoning: This sentence in Section 7.1 sets the required advance written notice to avoid automatic renewal: 'at least 60 days prior to end of such period.' This is the notice-to-prevent-renewal period.

renewal_term.raw_snippet: The Initial Term shall automatically be extended for an additional period of half a year unless either party provides the other party with written notification of termination of the letter Agreement at least 60 days prior to end of such period.
renewal_term.reasoning: Section 7.1 states the Initial Term 'shall automatically be extended for an additional period of half a year' which is the automatic renewal provision.
